definition: "cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
to accuse wrongly/to treat unjustly/injustice/wronged/not worthwhile
enemy/foe/(in opera) sweetheart or destined love
spendthrift and foolish/sb with more money than sense
unjust, fake and false charges (in a legal case)
ghost of one who died unjustly/departed spirit demanding vengeance for grievances
to be wronged/to be subjected to an injustice
to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
facts of an injustice/circumstances surrounding a miscarriage of justice

sentences.english: Laughing Chujiang empty at all, can not be washed naoomi injustice.
sentences.chinese: 堪笑楚江空渺渺，不能洗得直臣冤。

sentences.english: We feel wronged as we didn't use the chemical at all.
sentences.chinese: 我們很冤，因爲我們根本就沒有使用膨大劑。

sentences.english: Before our eyes, make known among the nations that you avenge the outpoured blood of your servants.
sentences.chinese: 願你使外邦人知道你在我們眼前，伸你僕人流血的冤。

sentences.english: let him be known among the heathen in our sight by the revenging of the blood of thy servants which is shed.
sentences.chinese: 願你使外邦人知道你在我們眼前，伸你僕人流血的冤。

definition: to accuse wrongly/to treat unjustly/injustice/wronged/not worthwhile
guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
to right wrongs/to redress an injustice
to be ashamed to face (sb)/to feel bad about having failed (sb)
to appeal for justice/to demand redress for a grievance
to complain of an injustice/to lament sb's misfortune
